Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT. Service resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
